posts.title: Hexo安装Next 6.6 主题
posts.text: 安装并应用Next主题blog目录下运行：1git clone https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next themes/next 更改网站配置文件：1theme: next 个性化主题更改主题样式(主题配置文件)1scheme: Pisces 更改头像(主题配置文件)123Sidebar Avataravatar: url: /gif/avatar1.gif 增加搜索功能命令行运行：1npm install hexo-generator-searchdb --save 网站配置文件添加：12345search: path: search.xml field: post format: html limit: 10000 主题配置文件修改：12local_search: enable: true 开启动态背景(主题配置文件内置了几种特效，需要开启的特性改为true)1234# Canvas-nest# Dependencies: https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-canvas-nestcanvas_nest: enable: true 同时需要安装相应的特效代码(查看官方网站的readme文档) 博客目录下运行：1git clone https://github.com/theme-next/theme-next-canvas-nest source/lib/canvas-nest 其它特效开启方式也是如此。

posts.title: Hexo本地媒体播放测试
posts.text: 1{% dplayer "url=/video/funny1.mp4" "pic=" "loop=no" "theme=#FADFA3" "autoplay=false" "token=tokendemo" %} (function(){var player = new DPlayer({"container":document.getElementById("dplayer0"),"theme":"#FADFA3","video":{"url":"/video/funny1.mp4"}});window.dplayers||(window.dplayers=[]);window.dplayers.push(player);})() 123<video src="/video/Aquaman Trailer 3.mp4" controls="controls">Your browser does not support the video tag.</video> Your browser does not support the video tag. 123<audio controls height="100" width="100"> <source src="/audio/holly.mp3"</audio> Seven Nation Army/Holly Henry Cinco/Ofelia K 1![](/image/57cfb7c2df173.jpg)

posts.title: Hexo远程媒体播放测试
posts.text: 视频播放安装视频播放插件dplayer，命令行运行：1npm install hexo-tag-dplayer dplayer演示：1{% dplayer "url=视频地址" "pic=" "loop=no" "theme=#FADFA3" "autoplay=false" "token=tokendemo" %} (function(){var player = new DPlayer({"container":document.getElementById("dplayer1"),"theme":"#FADFA3","loop":true,"video":{"url":"http://17431793.d.yyupload.com/down/17431793/MV/Kygo - This Town ft. Sasha Sloan - Music Video - Lyrics.mp4"}});window.dplayers||(window.dplayers=[]);window.dplayers.push(player);})() 音频播放安装音频播放插件aplayer,命令行运行：1npm install hexo-tag-aplayer aplayer演示1{% aplayer "雨樱" "MAYU" "音频地址" %} var ap = new APlayer({ element: document.getElementById("aplayer-knWwJmhx"), narrow: false, autoplay: false, showlrc: false, music: { title: "雨樱", author: "MAYU", url: "http://www.ytmp3.cn/down/56249.mp3", pic: "http://vrok.3vdo.net/image/雨樱.jpg", lrc: "" } }); window.aplayers || (window.aplayers = []); window.aplayers.push(ap);

posts.title: Hexo安装笔记
posts.text: 一、本地部署git https://git-scm.comnode.js https://nodejs.org/en/官方下载并一路默认安装打开CMD命令行 12345npm install -g hexo-clihexo init d:\blog\hexod:cd blog\hexohexo s 命令详情参考官方文档：https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/commands.html 正常的话，此时已可以通过浏览器访问“localhost:4000”打开本地搭建的网页了（hexo s 这个窗口不能关闭） 小技巧： 1hexo g -w 1hexo s -s 同时运行这2条命令，可实现本地网站内容更改后的实时更新 二、发布至Github1、注册Github2、相关配置 打开CMD命令行： 123git config --global user.name "Github用户名"git config --global user.email "Github注册邮箱"ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "Github注册邮箱" 打开”.ssh”目录下的“id_rsa.pub”,全选复制。去Github网站添加密钥（粘贴刚才复制的内容）。 更改网站配置文件的如下部分： 123deploy: type: git repo: 仓库地址.git CMD命令行进入本地网站主目录： 1npm install hexo-deployer-git --save 3、上传网站 CMD进入本地网站主目录：123hexo cleanhexo ghexo d 至此一切顺利的话，访问Github域名即可看到生成的网站了。
